entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
